short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Wordle Assistant helping you solve even the hardest days, without ruining the challenge by just giving you the answer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
---

Have you ever struggled at thinking of your next guess when playing Wordle? Ever had your mates laugh at your measly 99% success rate and 4 guess average?

Struggle no more! With this Wordle assistant, you can uncover letters or the next full word, helping guide you to the correct answer in fewer guesses.

When playing on the NYT website, simply open the extension and click the letters you want to reveal - the solver, built in Rust and WebAssembly will handle all the rest.

Reveal as few or many letters as you like, guiding you to the solution without ruining the challenge by just giving you the answer.

In a matter of weeks, you'll be the one flexing one your mates. Get Wordle Assistant today and clout is guaranteed.
